languages.text: "Ты — черное пятно, что словно кровавая катастрофа тянет к себе безвольный взор. Я хочу отвернуться... но то, как искажена твоя душа, пугает и завораживает".
"You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."
languages.original_text: "Ты — черное пятно, что словно кровавая катастрофа тянет к себе безвольный взор. Я хочу отвернуться... но то, как искажена твоя душа, пугает и завораживает".

traits.locale_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你就像一块黑色的斑点一样，我的目光不由自主地落在你身上，就仿佛看着异常恐怖的灾难。我也想看向别处……可你那扭曲的灵魂令我既害怕、又着迷。”
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: “你就像一块黑色的斑点一样，我的目光不由自主地落在你身上，就仿佛看着异常恐怖的灾难。我也想看向别处……可你那扭曲的灵魂令我既害怕、又着迷。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes qu'une tache noire difforme. Mes yeux sont irrésistiblement attirés vers vous comme vers une catastrophe épouvantable. J'aimerais regarder ailleurs... mais votre âme distordue est aussi effrayante que fascinante. »
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes qu'une tache noire difforme. Mes yeux sont irrésistiblement attirés vers vous comme vers une catastrophe épouvantable. J'aimerais regarder ailleurs... mais votre âme distordue est aussi effrayante que fascinante. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein schwarzer Fleck. Mein Blick wird unweigerlich von Euch angezogen, wie von einer grauenhaften Katastrophe. Ich will wegblicken ... doch die Verzerrung Eurer Seele ist ebenso beängstigend wie faszinierend."
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein schwarzer Fleck. Mein Blick wird unweigerlich von Euch angezogen, wie von einer grauenhaften Katastrophe. Ich will wegblicken ... doch die Verzerrung Eurer Seele ist ebenso beängstigend wie faszinierend."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは危険な人ですね…私の視線はなすすべもなく、悲惨な災難を見るように、あなたに引き寄せられる。視線をそらしたいのに…魂の歪みは恐ろしくもあり、魅惑的です」
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは危険な人ですね…私の視線はなすすべもなく、悲惨な災難を見るように、あなたに引き寄せられる。視線をそらしたいのに…魂の歪みは恐ろしくもあり、魅惑的です」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Eres una mancha negra... mi mirada se ve atraída hacia ti como si fuera un desastre espantoso. Quiero apartar la mirada... pero la distorsión de tu alma es tan aterradora como hipnótica».
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: «Eres una mancha negra... mi mirada se ve atraída hacia ti como si fuera un desastre espantoso. Quiero apartar la mirada... pero la distorsión de tu alma es tan aterradora como hipnótica».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

languages.text: "Kara bir lekesin. Bakışlarım, dehşet verici bir facia gibi çaresizce üstüne çekiliyor. Başka yöne bakmak istemiyorum ama... Ruhunun çarpıklığı hem büyüleyici hem de korkutucu."
languages.original_text: "You are a black blotch — my gaze is helplessly drawn toward you as to a grisly disaster. I want to look away... but the distortion of your soul is both frightening and mesmerising."

traits.locale_text: "Kara bir lekesin. Bakışlarım, dehşet verici bir facia gibi çaresizce üstüne çekiliyor. Başka yöne bakmak istemiyorum ama... Ruhunun çarpıklığı hem büyüleyici hem de korkutucu."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
